mapper.insert: insert into t_skintestdrug (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, DRUGID, DRUGNAME, DRUGCOMMNAME, BATCHNUMBER, DELAYTIME, ATTENTION, REMEDIAL) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugcommname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delaytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remedial,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_skintestdrug set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUGID = #{drugid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUGNAME = #{drugname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUGCOMMNAME = #{drugcommname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATCHNUMBER = #{batchnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELAYTIME = #{delaytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTENTION = #{attention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMEDIAL = #{remedial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, DRUGID, DRUGNAME, DRUGCOMMNAME, BATCHNUMBER, DELAYTIME, ATTENTION, REMEDIAL from t_skintestdrug where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, DRUGID, DRUGNAME, DRUGCOMMNAME, BATCHNUMBER, DELAYTIME, ATTENTION, REMEDIAL from t_skintestdrug
